snippet: An apparently off-the-cuff remark by Secretary General Ban Ki-moon caught his press office by surprise.
abstract: United Nations Secretary General Ban Ki-moon suggests that forthcoming report will present overwhelming evidence that Syrian government used chemical weapons.
lead_paragraph: An apparently off-the-cuff remark by Secretary General Ban Ki-moon caught his press office by surprise.

headline.main: U.N. Chief Says Report Will Confirm Gas Massacre
headline.print_headline: U.N. Chief Says Report Will Confirm Gas Massacre
